statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_id, hand_measurement_x FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_y > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_measurement_x DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_x > 0 AND hand_measurement_y < 10;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY hand_measurement_x DESC;
SELECT hand_measurement_x, hand_measurement_y FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_x BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id IN (3, 4) AND hand_measurement_y > 20 ORDER BY employee_id ASC, hand_measurement_y DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT hand_measurement_1, hand_measurement_2 FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_3 > 0.5;
SELECT movement_type, movement_timestamp FROM employee_movements WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_1 < 0.5 AND hand_measurement_2 > 0.75;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(movement_id) AS num_movements FROM employee_movements GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_movements > 10;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_1 > 0.5 AND hand_measurement_3 < 0.8 ORDER BY hand_measurement_1 ASC, hand_measurement_3 DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hand_measurement_2 FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_2 BETWEEN 1.0 AND 2.0;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_1 > 0.5 AND hand_measurement_3 < 0.8 ORDER BY hand_measurement_2 DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hand_measurement_1, hand_measurement_2, hand_measurement_3 FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_measurement_1 < 0.3 ORDER BY hand_measurement_1 ASC;
SELECT movement_id, employee_id, movement_type FROM employee_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Walking' ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employee_hand_data;
SELECT * FROM employee_tracking WHERE location = 'Office';
SELECT employee_id, timestamp FROM facility_access ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT employee_id, activity FROM employee_tracking WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT access_type FROM facility_access;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM employee_hand_data
SELECT * FROM employee_tracking WHERE activity = 'meeting' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT employee_id, timestamp FROM employee_tracking WHERE location = 'office' AND activity = 'working'
SELECT employee_id, access_type, access_timestamp FROM facility_access ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC
SELECT employee_id, location FROM employee_tracking INNER JOIN facility_access ON employee_tracking.employee_id = facility_access.employee_id
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM facility ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT employee_id, facility_id, timestamp FROM employee_movement WHERE facility_id = 2;
SELECT hand_shape, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hired_date FROM employee
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity FROM facility
SELECT hand_shape, hand_length, hand_width FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_length DESC
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, hired_date FROM employee WHERE employee_department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM employee_access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT area_name FROM access_areas WHERE area_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT employee_id, day_of_week, shift_start, shift_end FROM employee_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, s.day_of_week FROM employees e JOIN employee_schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT a.area_name, l.timestamp, l.status FROM access_areas a JOIN access_logs l ON a.area_id = l.area_id ORDER BY l.timestamp ASC;
